mapper.select: select dw.dailywork_no,dw.client_no,to_char(dw.daily_date,'hh24:mi') as daily_date,c.client_company,dw.emp_no,dw.daily_comment,c.client_loc_y,c.client_loc_x from dailywork dw,client c where dw.client_no = c.client_no and dw.emp_no = #{emp_no} and to_char(daily_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') like #{daily_date} order by daily_date
mapper.insert: insert into dailywork values( (select max(dailywork_no)+1 from dailywork), #{client_no}, #{emp_no}, #{daily_comment}, to_date(#{daily_date},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
